channel.title: Xlog fix?
channel.description:
well x-logging has become a problem on my server
so i need the fix for x-logging on delta
if anyone knows how to fix, please share
PS: i hear all you gotta do is remove 1 line (idk wat line tho >.>)
EDIT: all my attempts have failed attempt 1) player never gets logged out and its glitched causing major lag. attempt 2) player doesn't even stay on, logged imediatly.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 09, 2009, 01:36:38 am[/size][hr]bump plz
